mods.note: In any further communication on this subject, please quote No. XAi>K.y^/26b and address mo4 ip WT person by name Te Under-Secretary of State,” Foreign Office, London, S.W.l. Sir, EXT 3 b 39 file COPY pM ~> 0 © Foreign Office. 8.W. 1. 3rd June, 1946. I am directed by Mr. Secretary Bevin to inform you that His Majesty's Consul at Zahidan has requested that he be supplied with four Consular flags. Two of the flags are 8 breadth and will cost £3.10s.0d. the other two are 4 breadth and will cost £1.8s.0d. <2. I am to enquire if the Secretary of State for India will be prepared to meet the cost of these flags, h receivable order for £4.18s.0d. is enclosed. T ^ I am, Sir, • Your obedient Servant, The Under-Secretary of State, India Office.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 3939/46 'Supply of consular flags to HM Consul, Zahidan'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence relating to the supply of consular flags to HM Consul, Zahidan. The main correspondents are: the Under-Secretary of State, India Office; the Foreign Office and the Under Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs on behalf of the Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs.
